amendatorysection.catchline: Encumbrance proceedings; not to delay distribution of other shares.
amendatorysection.para: The proceedings in relation to the encumbrances shall not delay the distribution of the proceeds of other shares in respect to which no difficulties exist.

annotation.para: In default of owner, person holding an encumbrance may appear and act as his representative. Hartman v. Drake, 166 Neb. 87, 87 N.W.2d 895 (1958).
